languages.text: {n}Серая, неприглядная лоза вьется по уцелевшим остовам клетки, почти сливаясь с холодным камнем депо. Каждый усик неказистого растения увенчан единственным листом — пожухлым, но все еще живым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Серая, неприглядная лоза вьется по уцелевшим остовам клетки, почти сливаясь с холодным камнем депо. Каждый усик неказистого растения увенчан единственным листом — пожухлым, но все еще живым.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Серая, неприглядная лоза вьется по уцелевшим остовам клетки, почти сливаясь с холодным камнем депо. Каждый усик неказистого растения увенчан единственным листом — пожухлым, но все еще живым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}

{n}A gray, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the scruffy plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}

{n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}

{n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}

{n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}

languages.text: {n}灰色の醜いツタが、檻の残骸を縫うように伸びている。そのツタは、車庫の冷たい石とほぼ一体化している。荒れた植物の蔓の上には、しなびた、それでもまだ生きている葉が一枚ずつついている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}灰色の醜いツタが、檻の残骸を縫うように伸びている。そのツタは、車庫の冷たい石とほぼ一体化している。荒れた植物の蔓の上には、しなびた、それでもまだ生きている葉が一枚ずつついている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una liana gris y fea serpentea entre los restos de la jaula prácticamente camuflándose con la piedra gris del depósito. Cada uno de los zarcillos de la maltrecha planta tiene una hoja en la punta. Está marchita, pero viva.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una liana gris y fea serpentea entre los restos de la jaula prácticamente camuflándose con la piedra gris del depósito. Cada uno de los zarcillos de la maltrecha planta tiene una hoja en la punta. Está marchita, pero viva.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一株歪歪扭扭的灰色蔓藤钻出牢笼的残骸，与货栈冰冷的石墙几乎融为一体。粗糙蔓藤的每根卷须上，都挂着一片无精打采的叶子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一株歪歪扭扭的灰色蔓藤钻出牢笼的残骸，与货栈冰冷的石墙几乎融为一体。粗糙蔓藤的每根卷须上，都挂着一片无精打采的叶子。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une étrange liane grise serpente sur les ruines de la cage et semble presque se fondre dans la pierre glacée de l'entrepôt. Chaque vrille de la plante épuisée est surmontée d'une unique feuille flétrie, mais vivante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une étrange liane grise serpente sur les ruines de la cage et semble presque se fondre dans la pierre glacée de l'entrepôt. Chaque vrille de la plante épuisée est surmontée d'une unique feuille flétrie, mais vivante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine graue, unansehnliche Kletterpflanze windet sich durch die Überreste des Käfigs, verschmilzt fast mit dem kalten Stein des Depots. An jeder Ranke der wuchernden Pflanze hängt ein einzelnes Blatt, vertrocknet, aber noch am Leben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine graue, unansehnliche Kletterpflanze windet sich durch die Überreste des Käfigs, verschmilzt fast mit dem kalten Stein des Depots. An jeder Ranke der wuchernden Pflanze hängt ein einzelnes Blatt, vertrocknet, aber noch am Leben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gri ve çirkin bir asma dalı, kafesin kalıntılarından kıvrıla kıvrıla uzanıp neredeyse deponun soğuk taş zeminiyle birleşmiş. Lime lime olmuş bitkinin filizlerinden her birinde tek bir yaprak duruyor. Pörsümüş ama hâlâ hayatta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A grey, unsightly vine winds through the surviving remnants of the cage, almost merging with the cold stone of the depot. Each tendril of the ragged plant is topped with a single leaf, shrivelled but still alive.{/n}
